projects.title: Solar Farm GIS Project
projects.summary: GIS suitability model to identify the best solar farm parcels on Saddle Lake IR #125.
projects.description: Built a GIS suitability workflow to identify solar farm locations on Saddle Lake Indian Reserve #125. Process included DEM-derived slope/aspect screening (excluding slopes > 10° and north-facing aspects), legal/environmental filtering using WHS, and a combined road + transmission access cost surface using distance accumulation.
projects.result: Produced a “truly potential land” layer and a final map of four candidate parcels, evaluated by minimum access cost and Cost/MWh (generation estimated from area-based capacity assumptions).

projects.title: PPO LunarLander-v3
projects.summary: Reinforcement learning project: PPO with parallel environments, evaluation tracking, and model deployment.
projects.tools: Python, Gymnasium, Stable-Baselines3 (PPO), NumPy, Matplotlib, Hugging Face Hub
projects.description: Trained a Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) agent on LunarLander-v3 using 16 parallel environments. Used evaluation callbacks to save the best checkpoint and tracked training performance over time.
projects.result: Best model saved automatically during training, evaluated over 100 episodes, plotted mean reward vs. timesteps, and packaged/uploaded the trained agent to the Hugging Face Hub. Evaluation performance: 302.83 ± 17.47 mean reward (100 episodes).

projects.title: White Tiger Websites
projects.summary: Designed and built a responsive multi-page website with reusable layout components and interactive forms.
projects.description: Built a multi-page website for a fictional web development company with shared navigation/header/footer styling, a portfolio-style home page, a quotes page with pricing table + quote request form, and a feedback form page.
projects.result: A responsive site using CSS Grid + media queries for layout, reusable header/footer components, and interactive form behavior (e.g., showing/hiding additional inputs based on checkbox selections).

projects.title: Video Game Patch Data Impact Analysis
projects.summary: Analyzed gameplay performance before and after a patch to quantify balance changes.
projects.description: Collected, cleaned, and analyzed gameplay data to compare performance metrics pre- and post-patch. Built plots to highlight shifts in key indicators and support conclusions about balance impact.
projects.result: Delivered a concise analysis showing which metrics shifted most after the update and summarized implications for game balance.

projects.title: Parks & Pathways Overview
projects.imageAlt: Interactive map showing Calgary parks and pathways layers
projects.summary: Interactive Leaflet map exploring Calgary's green space network with toggleable layers for parks, pathways/trails, and the city boundary.
projects.description: Built a responsive web map with a legend panel and layer toggles to compare how parks and trails connect across Calgary.
projects.result: Users can switch layers on/off and visually identify corridors where major park areas connect via pathways.

projects.title: Procedural Tank Artillery Game
projects.imageAlt: Plot of projectile trajectories over procedural terrain in a tank artillery game
projects.summary: Turn-based artillery game with procedurally generated terrain, projectile physics, and a simple computer opponent.
projects.description: Implemented terrain generation with random sine parameters, discrete collision detection against the ground, and hit detection between tanks; visualized each turn's shots and terrain.
projects.result: Playable terminal game that plots each round and tracks tank health until a win/loss.
